name: CreateNewAsanaProject
description:
Create a new project in an Asana workspace or team.

This tool creates a new project in a specified workspace or team within Asana. It is essential to specify the workspace, and if applicable, the team, especially when the workspace is an organization. Once set, these cannot be changed. Use this tool to organize tasks and initiatives within Asana projects.

parameters.name: project_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the project to create, such as name, description, workspace, and team if applicable.

parameters.name: included_properties_list
parameters.description: List of properties to include in the response. Specify as a comma-separated list to include optional fields that are excluded by default.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for readable JSON formatting with indents and line breaks. This is useful for debugging but increases response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.
